layer.name: Causality
layer.definition: Actions have consequences; you reap what you sow.

questions.text: The quality of my relationship with God is connected to the time and attention I invest ...

answers.5: directly — time and attention reliably deepen relationship
answers.2: possibly — but I don't see a clear pattern
answers.3: somewhat — sometimes effort helps, sometimes it doesn't
answers.1: not really — closeness to God seems random

questions.text: Spiritual dryness usually has identifiable causes ...
questions.principle: Current state results from prior causes

answers.4: usually — I can typically trace dryness to something specific
answers.5: almost always — neglected practices, unaddressed sin, or competing priorities
answers.2: possibly — but I can't identify them
answers.3: sometimes — some dry seasons have clear causes, others don't
answers.1: not really — it just comes and goes

questions.text: The connection between consistent prayer/Scripture and spiritual clarity is ...
questions.principle: Sowing spiritual disciplines reaps spiritual fruit

answers.4: generally clear — consistency usually produces clarity
answers.5: unmistakable — spiritual input directly produces spiritual output
answers.3: partial — sometimes they connect, sometimes not
answers.1: nonexistent — I don't see a pattern

questions.text: Expecting spiritual growth without spiritual investment is ...
questions.principle: The law of sowing and reaping applies to spiritual life

answers.4: generally unrealistic — growth usually requires investment
answers.5: like expecting harvest without planting — cause and effect applies
answers.2: somewhat naive — but effort isn't everything
answers.3: mixed — some growth requires effort, some is given
answers.1: reasonable — growth is God's job, not mine

questions.text: I can trace my current spiritual state back to specific choices and habits ...

answers.4: mostly — I can see most of the causal chain
answers.5: clearly — my choices directly shaped where I am spiritually
answers.3: partially — some of it traces back, some doesn't
answers.1: not at all — my spiritual state feels random
